participant_1.name: Sarah
participant_1.personality: Creative and thoughtful, Sarah enjoys exploring different hobbies and values her relationships with family.
participant_1.background: I'm a mystery movie fan and a baker. My father died when I was 2. I need to use an inhaler sometimes. I have a close relationship with my family despite my hectic schedule. I want a home with a big yard for my dogs to run and play in.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Crafty and practical, Alex enjoys hands-on work and prefers a calm environment over crowded events.
participant_2.background: I am passionate about being crafty and working with my hands. I like to shop. I like to stay away from big crowds, so Comic Con isn't my thing. I am the leader of the french fry research department at Del Taco. I do not drink alcohol.

content.text: My name is Alex, nice to meet you! What's yours?
Hi Alex, my name is Sarah. How are you today?
I'm doing well! I'm just a little tired. I work at Del Taco and I'm in charge of the french fry research department.
That's really interesting! What's the most interesting thing you've learned about french fries?
I've learned a lot about how to make the perfect fry. I've also learned a lot about the history of french fries.
That's so cool! I love history. Do you have any hobbies?
Yes, I love to be crafty and work with my hands. I also like to shop.
Me too! I love to bake. Do you have any pets?
I have two dogs, a golden retriever and a labrador retriever.
That's awesome! I have a cat and a dog.
What's your favorite type of movie?
I love mystery movies. What's yours?
We should watch a movie together sometime!
